actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the authorization for the Oahe unit, James division, Missouri River Basin project, South Dakota should remain in effect.

summary.text: Declares that the Oahe unit, James division, Missouri River Basin project, South Dakota, is a worthwhile project but that the authorized plan needs modification. Welcomes a modification plan from the State of South Dakota. Continues authorization for such project.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the authorization for the Oahe unit, James division, Missouri River Basin project, South Dakota should remain in effect.
